mapper.select:
select CART.MEMBER_NO , CART.CLASS_NO , CART.ORDER_YN , C.CLASS_NAME , C.PRICE , mem.nick as teacher_no from CART CART
join CLASS C on C.NO = CART.CLASS_NO
JOIN TEACHER TEA ON C.TEACHER_NO = TEA.no
join member mem on mem.no = tea.member_no
where CART.MEMBER_NO = #{mno} and CART.ORDER_YN = 'N'

select WISH.MEMBER_NO , WISH.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME , C.PRICE , mem.nick as teacher_no from WISH WISH
join CLASS C on C.NO = WISH.CLASS_NO
JOIN TEACHER TEA ON C.TEACHER_NO = TEA.no
join member mem on mem.no = tea.member_no
where WISH.MEMBER_NO = #{mno}
